name: ABAP RAP Flight Booking
tagline: Enterprise Flight Management System with SAP ABAP RAP
description: A comprehensive flight management system built with SAP ABAP RESTful Application Programming (RAP) framework, featuring CDS Views, Fiori annotations, advanced search capabilities, and rich visualizations. Demonstrates modern SAP development practices with database management, business services, and enterprise-grade UI components.

responsibilities: Architected database tables for Airlines and Flight entities with ABAP DDL
Developed CDS Views with UI annotations for Fiori integration
Implemented Business Services with Service Definitions and Bindings
Created ABAP programs for data insertion and deletion operations
Built advanced search functionality with fuzzy search capabilities

features: CDS Views with complex calculations and associations for flight data
Fiori UI annotations with search, filters, and selection fields
Advanced visualizations including donut charts and progress indicators
Fuzzy search capabilities with configurable threshold settings
Real-time utilization calculations and seat availability tracking
Multi-currency support with semantic annotations for amounts

metrics: Built 2 core database tables with comprehensive field definitions
Implemented 1 complex CDS View with 15+ calculated fields and UI annotations
Created 4 ABAP programs for complete CRUD operations
Supports multiple airlines with varied currency and plane type configurations
highlights: Designed scalable database schema with proper normalization and associations
Implemented advanced UI annotations for rich Fiori user experience
Built comprehensive search functionality with fuzzy matching capabilities
Created dynamic calculations for seat utilization and availability metrics
